name: Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3
description: Hey! Things are really cookin' on Kitchen Island! Wario's got a scheme to steal the pirates' treasure so he can have his very own castle! You help Wario get the treasure by smashing into the magic pots! Each pot changes him into Dragon Wario, or Jet Wario! With each change comes new powers!Dozens of enemies try to stop Wario, but you have the power to beat them!
